scripts.watch: source exportLocal.sh && nodemon -V -e ts,graphql -w ./src -x yarn run start
scripts.watch-trigger: source exportLocal.sh && nodemon -V -e ts,graphql -w ./src -x yarn trigger
scripts.remove-charts: helm uninstall lnd | helm uninstall mongodb | helm uninstall redis | helm uninstall bitcoind
scripts.forward-mongodb: kubectl port-forward $(kubectl get pods -l app.kubernetes.io/name=mongodb | awk '/mongo/ {print $1}') 27017
scripts.restart-charts: yarn remove-charts || : && sleep 5 && yarn run add-charts
scripts.test-local-clean: yarn use-minikube && yarn run restart-charts && yarn jest --clearCache && yarn run test-local
scripts.test-local: yarn use-minikube && source exportLocal.sh && yarn jest --runInBand --verbose $TEST | pino-pretty -c -l
scripts.watch-devnet: . ../../../infrastructure/exportCloudDevnet.sh && nodemon -V -e ts,graphql -w ./src -x yarn ts-node src/index.ts | pino-pretty -c -l
scripts.lnd-connection: source exportLocal.sh && echo $MACAROON | base64 -d > ./macaroon && echo $TLS | base64 -d > ./tls.cert && lncli --network regtest --macaroonpath=./macaroon --tlscertpath=./tls.cert --rpcserver=${LNDIP}:${LNDRPCPORT} getinfo
